mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_mentor ( mentor_id, company, mentordate, mentor_Email, STARTDATE, ENDDATE , TITLE, CONTENT, FIELD, BIO, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE , MENTOR_NAME) VALUES(#{mentorId},#{company},#{mentorDate},#{mentorEmail},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{title},#{content}, #{field},#{bio},sysdate,sysdate, #{mentorName})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_mentor where mentor_email=#{mentorEmail}

select M.mentor_id as mentorId , M.startdate as startDate , M.enddate as endDate , M.mentordate as mentorDate , M.appl_email as applEmail , MEM.name as applName from ( select row_number() over (order by mentor_id) num , A.* from tbl_mentor A order by mentor_id ) M LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_MEMBER MEM on M.appl_email = MEM.email where num between #{startrow} and #{startrow}+10 and mentor_email=#{mentorEmail} order by mentordate asc, startdate asc
mapper.update: update tbl_mentor set appl_email=#{appEmail} where mentor_email=#{mentorEmail}
mapper.select: SELECT mentor_id as mentorId ,mentor_email as mentorEmail ,startdate as startDate ,enddate as endDate ,mentordate as mentorDate ,company ,mentor_name as mentorName FROM ( select rownum rn ,mentor_id ,mentor_email ,startdate ,enddate ,mentordate ,company ,mentor_name from TBL_MENTOR where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and appl_email = #{email} ) where (rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}) order by mentordate asc, startdate asc
select name from tbl_member where email = #{mentorEmail}
select count(*) from TBL_MENTOR where appl_email = #{email}
